content: > espace tricot is a yarn store in > montreal canada discover our yarns > here www espacetricot com 1 this soft and squishy baby blanket was inspired by artfil s seashell colourway and brings to mind seaside strolls along the the boardwalk with your little one the ribbed border is maintained along the selvedge edges while the body of the blanket features a pretty slip-stitch texture detail the simple 4-row repeat makes this a rhythmic yet engaging pattern one that you will enjoy knitting from cast on to bind off
